triplets: Sweet, bell-shaped fruit from the genus Pyrus, grown in temperate climates
Eating fresh, salads, baking, canning, and making juices or ciders
Fleshy fruit, skin, seeds, and core
Skin, sweet flesh, core with seeds, and sometimes stem
Green, yellow, red, or brown depending on variety
Orchard ecosystems, fruit baskets, and healthy diets
Ripe: a few days; unripe can ripen over 1–2 weeks
